definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: When forty winters shall besiege thy brow.
sentences.chinese: 四十個冬天將圍攻你的額角。

sentences.english: Prince Andrey went round the bed and kissed her on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈公爵從沙發一旁繞過去，吻了吻她的額角。

sentences.english: Cold sweat bedewed Mr. Lin's forehead. He was frantic.
sentences.chinese: 可是林先生卻急壞了，冷汗從額角上鑽出來。

sentences.english: Jian Tong presses the sum Cape and makes oneself calm down hard.
sentences.chinese: 簡桐按着額角，努力讓自己冷靜下來。

sentences.english: Blue veins stood out on his temples.
It descended trembling from their temples and ribs.
sentences.chinese: 微微顫抖著從額角和肋骨往下移。

sentences.english: Unmerciful edge of knife keep on at innocent frontal eminence.
sentences.chinese: 無情的刀刃兒糾纏着無辜的額角。

definition: Jin'an district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
waistband of a skirt/(fig.) related to the wife or another female family member
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
